quotes.quote: The vast majority of human beings are not interested in reason or satisfied with what it teaches.
People are not interested in you. They are not interested in me. They are interested in themselves - morning, noon and after dinner.
You have to be interested. If you're not interested, you can't be interesting.
Parents are not interested in justice, they're interested in peace and quiet.
The world is not interested in what we do for a living. What they are interested in is what we have to offer freely - hope, strength, love and the power to make a difference!
Nothing is interesting if you are not interested.
Only a good-for-nothing is not interested in his past.
Bitter people are not interested in what you say, but what you hide.
We are not interested in the possibilities of defeat. They do not exist.
If you're not interested in getting better, it's time for you to stop leading.
A writer is not interested in explaining reality, he’s only interested in capturing it.
Just because you do not take an interest in politics doesn't mean politics won't take an interest in you.
People who are not interested in food always seem rather dry and unloving and don't have a real gusto for life.
The body is not interested in anything you are interested in. And that is the battle that is going on all the time.
You cannot talk to people successfully if they think you are not interested in what they have to say or you have no respect for them.
You cannot will yourself to be interested in something you're not interested in. But you can actively discover and deepen your interest.
If youre not interested in life, then photography has no meaning.
We are not interested in the unusual, but in the usual seen unusually.
God is not interested in our spiritual life. He's interested in our life.
Anyone who's not interested in model airplanes must have a screw loose somewhere.
You are responsible for every part of your image, even the parts you're not interested in.
God is not interested in you doing this for Him, He is interested in doing things through you.
The men who are not interested in philosophy need it most urgently; they are most helplessly in its power.
God is not interested in the seeds he put in you; He is interested in the fruits that must come out of you!
The Bible is not interested in precisionism unless the context indicates that precision is particularly important.
A lighthouse is not interested in who gets its light! It just gives it without thinking! Giving light is its nature!
Only men who are not interested in women are interested in women's clothes. Men who like women never notice what they wear.
Anyone who wants to sell you overnight success or wealth is not interested in your success; they are interested in your money.
People in general are not interested in paying extra for increased safety. At the beginning seat belts cost $200 and nobody bought them.
God is not interested in our public displays of piety. He's not interested in religion in terms of the outward show. He's interested in godliness.
